parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Eden Editor
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Event Handlers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Removes Eden Editor event handler of given type and ID.
<br><br>
See the list of all [[Arma_3:_Event_Handlers:_Eden_Editor|Eden Editor Event Handlers]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''remove3DENEventHandler''' [type,id]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> type: [[String]] - name of event handler
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> id: [[Number]] - ID of event handler, returned by [[add3DENEventHandler]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>eh = [[add3DENEventHandler]] ["onUndo",{[[systemChat]] "Zip..."}];
[[remove3DENEventHandler]] ["onUndo",eh];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>  
[[add3DENEventHandler]]
[[removeAll3DENEventHandlers]]
</value></part></template></root>
